name: Knights Of Honour
description:
The Empire of Darkness is attacking our Kingdom. Repel the attackers and take down this evil. This is the duty of the Knights of Honour

This is a melee focus combat game featuring different types and enemies and bosses. There will be multiple levels to progress and for you to be an experienced knight.

Will you defeat the enemy and bring honour to your kingdom?

This is the longest game I've ever made and I hope you will enjoy the game.
